adminPricingPanel.title: Admin Pricing Panel
adminPricingPanel.planValidation: Plan name must contain only letters and spaces.
adminPricingPanel.perValidation: Plan per must contain only letters and spaces.
adminPricingPanel.priceValidation: Price must be a valid number, e.g., 10 or 10.99
adminPricingPanel.featuresValidation: Features must be characters separated by commas.
adminPricingPanel.linkValidation: Link must be a valid URL starting with http or https.
